Sentencas: A rapid start-up strategy of a diesel reformer for on-board fuel cell applications was developed by fuel cell integration.
Titulo: Rapid start-up strategy of 1 kWe diesel reformer by solid oxide fuel cell integration

Sentencas: With the integration with metal-supported solid oxide fuel cell which has high thermal shock resistance, a simpler and faster start-up protocol of the diesel reformer was obtained compared to that of the independent reformer setup without considering fuel cell integration.
Titulo: Rapid start-up strategy of 1 kWe diesel reformer by solid oxide fuel cell integration

Sentencas: A reformer without fuel cell integration showed unstable reactor temperatures during the start-up process, which affects the reforming catalyst durability.
Titulo: Rapid start-up strategy of 1 kWe diesel reformer by solid oxide fuel cell integration

Sentencas: By utilizing waste heat from the fuel cell stack, steam required at the diesel autothermal reforming could be stably provided during the start-up process.
Titulo: Rapid start-up strategy of 1 kWe diesel reformer by solid oxide fuel cell integration

Sentencas: The developed diesel reformer was thermally sustainable after the initial heat-up process.
Titulo: Rapid start-up strategy of 1 kWe diesel reformer by solid oxide fuel cell integration

Sentencas: As a result, the overall start-up time of the reformer after the diesel supply was reduced to 9 min from the diesel supply compared to 22 min without fuel cell integration.
Titulo: Rapid start-up strategy of 1 kWe diesel reformer by solid oxide fuel cell integration
